Flat Attack Tire Sealant is unique for many reasons:

Flat Attack is the only tire sealant that offers a 5 year guarantee. 

Flat Attack is the only tire sealant that is intentionally designed and manufactured to be environmentally friendly.

Flat Attack is the Original Green Sealant and has been on the market longer than any of the other major tire sealant brands.

Flat Attack is a family owned business proudly manufactured in the USA.

Flat Attack can be used for a wide variety of applications:

Family Bikes, Mountain Bikes, Racing Bikes, Advanced Bikes.

Bike Trailers, Tag-a-Longs, Recumbants.

Golf Carts, ATVs, Outdoor Vehicles.

Wheel Barrows, Lawn Mowers, Lawn and Garden Equipment.

Construction and Industrial Equipment.

en.description:
F21 has been specifically formulated as an All Natural Sugar Blocker to help limit your blood sugar absorption.

Pure source. Restore balance. Improve body. Master control. Empower your desires. Go ahead! We’ve got you covered!

zh.description: PRIME的有效成分不仅可以阻断来自碳水化合物的糖的吸收，它还能促进体内储存的脂肪的分解。PRIME抑制了α-淀粉酶及α-葡萄糖苷酶，使得产生葡萄糖的淀粉和糖原不能被分解，帮助机体控制糖分摄入，防止发胖、得病。而当食物中的淀粉糖被阻断，人体在需要葡萄糖营养大脑及神经系统时，PRIME中的另一组有效成分还可促使体内储存的脂肪分解，通过糖异生过程产生葡萄糖来生成能量；一来可以帮助人体消耗多余的脂肪，二来又可保证机体正常活动。PRIME一起阻断人体不希望得到的过多的糖分，让它们转而帮助益生菌生长，带来更多的保健效益。
zh.name: PRIME - 碳水化合物阻断剂
zh.title: PRIME - 碳水化合物阻断剂

en.description:
Our 30 Day Diet™ is designed to help you lose weight without the usual discomfort and diet guilt from cheating. How? We've formulated this weight loss aid to address the needs of dieters who have little time for counting calories and endless exercise. 30 Day's carefully chosen herbal extracts are designed to help you feel less hunger, feel full longer, and have more energy for your day even while you are eating less.


WHAT IT IS

30 Day Diet™ is designed to help with sustainable weight loss. The nutrition experts at Creative Bioscience® know what works for weight loss, and we've put our best into this product. You don't have to take out a loan, get a doctor's prescription, or go under the knife to achieve your weight loss goals. Weight loss has never been this accessible and affordable!

Get your diet capsules, drink plenty of water, and let us help you lose serious fat with clinically supported science and natural herbal extracts. Keep with it until you lose all of the extra pounds that you want to get rid of. Within about a month, you can renegotiate your relationship with food and make lasting lifestyle changes for the better.

HOW IT WORKS

It's pretty simple, you just take 2 capsules a half hour before breakfast with a glass of water. The capsules go to work, and you do your thing and live your life. Drink plenty of water throughout the day, get fresh air, move around, and make clever food choices from the “Allowed Foods” List. You know that insanity is doing the same thing over and over again but expecting a different result. Don't starve yourself; don't be miserable.

There is a better way: use innovation and modern technology to melt away those last few pounds of stubborn fat. 30 Day Diet™ offers an eating protocol, but is designed to help dieters reach their goal no matter which diet they currently follow. It can also be used to help you maintain your desired weight when you have reached your weight loss goal.
en.name: 30 Day Diet
en.title: Creative Bisoscience - 30 Day Diet

zh.description:
产品介绍

30 Day's Diet （30天瘦身）是一款为可持续的瘦身计划而设计的营养食品。我们的营养专家熟知什么能帮助瘦身，本产品包含了他们研究成果的最佳成分。您再也不需要昂贵的医生处方药或者外科手术去达到瘦身的目标。这款瘦身产品达到了前所未有的经济与便利！

准备好瘦身胶囊和大量的水，让我们用临床结果证实了的科学方法和天然草本植物提取物真正帮助您减去脂肪。只要坚持服用直到您减掉所有您不想要的体重，达到理想的瘦身目标。一个月不到，您就可以重新搭配饮食，保持更好的生活方式。

使用说明

简单得很，用一杯水在食用早餐前30分钟吞服2个胶囊。让胶囊开始工作，您照过您的日子。一天当中饮用足量的水，呼吸新鲜空气，做一些运动，从“当用食品”列表中聪明地选择您的食品。我们都知道重复做同样的事而达不到效果是非常痛苦的。别再节食，别再折磨自己。

我们有更好的方法：利用创新的和现代的科技手段来减掉那些多余的顽固脂肪。30 Day‘s Diet 提供的饮食方案能帮助服用者在已有的饮食习惯前提下达到其瘦身目标。本产品还可以帮助保持达到瘦身目标之后的体重。
zh.name: 30天瘦身
zh.title: 30天瘦身

en.description:
1234 Diet Drops® is a dynamic supplement designed for weight loss. It contains a proprietary blend of ingredients that are clinically supported to promote fat metabolism and provide essential nutrition. Based on clinical research, the goal of 1234 Diet Drops® dieting is to burn fat and then maintain ideal body weight.

HOW IT WORKS
Dieters choose a calorie plan to fit their situation. Customers testify that following the 1234 Diet Drops® protocol helps them slim down with less fatigue and hunger, with fewer cravings. Charts, recipes, and complimentary, live support help ensure successful results. Trained weight loss experts stand ready 24/7 to assist 1234 Diet Drops® dieters set reasonable goals, get past diet plateaus, and answer questions. Typically, people will do either a 23-day or a 44-day cycle, as recommended by Dr. Simeons. Our 1234 Diet Drops® come in a 2-ounce bottle. Each bottle is approximately a 3-week supply, enough to complete the 23-day cycle. 
1234 Diet Drops® is for men and women of adult age. The most common side effect reported is mild headaches, and those typically go away after the first few days on the supplement when your body has acclimated to the difference in your diet. No serious or long-term negative effects have been reported. 
The diet has been around for almost 50 years. It was discovered and researched by Dr. A.T.W Simeons in Rome. He studied and perfected the diet for almost 20 years. Just like Dr. Simeons, Creative Bioscience® is committed to weight loss, which is why we provide a 24 hour support line with trained diet support staff that are available anytime for questions or concerns. We have free diet information and recipes on our website as well.
en.name: 1234 Diet Drops®
en.title: Creative Bioscience - 1234 Diet Drops®

zh.description:
本产品是专为长效瘦身而设计的活力食品添加剂。它所含有精选的氨基酸和植物精华已在临床上结果显示既能加快脂肪代谢，又能提供必需的营养素. 根据Albert. T.M. Simeons博士的突破性研究1234 Diet Drops®的目标是燃烧脂肪和保持理想体重。

 产品功效

使用者选择一个根据自身情况而定的卡路里摄入计划。用户们反馈1234 Diet Drops®帮助减少了在瘦身时的产生的疲劳和饥饿感。各种图表、餐食配方和免费的现场支持可保证满意的结果。经过培训的瘦身专家们将一周7天每天24小时来帮助1234 Diet Drops®的用户制定瘦身目标、助您度过瓶颈期和解答疑问。一般来说，用户可选择由Simeons博士建议的23天周期或44天周期的两种计划。1234 Diet Drops®每瓶为2盎司。一瓶等于3个星期的用量或23天周期用量。

1234 Diet Drops®适用于成年男性与女性。常见的副作用是轻微的头疼，但在服用产品若干天和当身体适应产品后自然消失。未发现有长期的或严重的副作用。这项饮食计划是Simesons博士在罗马开发与研究出来的，已有近50年的历史。他花了快20年的时间来研究和完善这饮食计划。跟Simeons博士一样, 本公司也是一直致力于瘦身减肥，我们训练有素的客服团队为您提供24小时服务。网站提供免费的饮食计划信息和配方。

en.description:
HCA (hydroxycitric acid) blocks fat by inhibiting citrate lyase, a key enzyme necessary to convert carbohydrates into stored fat. Blocking citrate lyase also stops production of LDL cholesterol and lowers triglyceride levels. Triglycerides are the main form of body fat, the kind that builds up on your trouble areas— hips, belly, waist. 

Other proposed weight loss actions of HCA include appetite suppression and increased thermogenesis (fat oxidation). HCA may also control cravings by boosting serotonin levels in your brain. Low serotonin levels have been linked to depression and anxiety, so the HCA in Garcinia Cambogia 1234® could improve your mood and your sleep quality, making it less likely for you to react to stress by eating comfort food.
en.name: Garcinia Cambogia 1234
en.title: Creative Bioscience - Garcinia Cambogia 1234

en.description:
Garcinia Cambogia contains HCA (Hydroxycitric acid) which is believed to block fat by inhibiting Citrate Lyase, a key enzyme necessary to convert carbohydrates into stored fat. HCA may also control cravings by boosting serotonin levels in your brain, making it less likely for you to react to stress by eating comfort food. 

Low serotonin levels have been linked to depression and anxiety. Green Coffee Bean Extract contains Chlorogenic Acid which comes from the unroasted coffee bean. It works by binding to fat compounds in your digestive system so they pass through you without being absorbed. At the same time, Chlorogenic Acid is slowing the release of glucose into your bloodstream after eating so that your body uses stored fat for energy.

en.description:
Spark Naturals Rose Water is an herbal distillate, which is an important co-product produced in the process of making Spark Naturals Rose essential oil. The amazing thing about that is that Spark Naturals Rose Water carries many of the beneficial properties of Rose essential oil (although in a much lower concentration). 

Rose water has been used by generations in food, skincare, and haircare products. It is well-known for its many benefits, which include (but are not limited to): -improving skin tone and elasticity -moisturizing (great for dry skin, but appropriate for all skin types -it is effective, but not a heavy moisturizer) -helping to prevent and possibly even alleviate sun damage (research is ongoing regarding substantiating these claims) -anti-inflammatory (excellent for soothing sensitive skin) -rich source of antioxidants Spark Naturals Rose Water is a fantastic moisturizer, linen spray, facial toner, and makeup remover.

Rose water is often used in cooking applications as well, including many middle eastern and southeast asian drinks and foods. Imagine all the possibilities in combination with other beneficial essential oils!
en.name: Rose Water
en.title: Spark Naturals - Rose Water

en.description:
Yellowstone is America's first National Park, and covers approximately 3,500 square miles of lakes, canyons, rivers and mountain ranges. Home to the world's largest active super volcano and half of the world's geothermal features, Yellowstone is also home to hundreds of species of mammals, birds, fish and reptiles, including several that are either endangered or threatened. Eric has captured the beauty and complexity of this American favorite, full of cascading waterfalls, beloved Old Faithful, and all types of wildlife communing with tourists!

500 Piece Puzzle
en.name: Yellowstone
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Yellowstone - 500

en.description: Enter into the world of a child, where toys come to life and everything is safe and friendly. You’ll love this imaginary wonderland, where kids have fun riding, flying, and playing with their big, colorful and kind playmates. This fun-filled painting makes a great reprint for decorating a child's room or as one of our most popular children's puzzles.
en.name: Dinosaur Games
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Dinosaur Games - 100

en.description: This painting depicts the south rim of the Grand Canyon in the late afternoon, when the canyon walls are bathed in the unforgettable orange colors that have captured the heart of so many visitors. This image captures the relaxed feeling of a National Parks summer vacation and features many notable South Rim landmarks, including Bright Angel Lodge, The El Tovar Hotel, and the Desert View Watchtower to East, and of course, the Grand Canyon Railway.
en.name: Grand Canyon
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Grand Canyon - 500

en.description: FINALLY! It has been requested by people for years but finally Eric has created a folk art piece about cats. This makes sense as cats are the most popular pet in the world (by almost 3 to 1.) Have fun getting to know these cat characters. You may even find your feline friend in the mix. Take a little time and go Kitty Wampus with us. Purr-fect.

images.alt: Image of Cats Around the World

You will have a "good time" with this print or puzzle no matter what the season.

en.description:
A riot of color and activity, this unique and distinctive puzzle is a feast for the eye. Set against the backdrop of the Hong Kong cityscape, it seems that everyone is actively engaged, and having a lot of fun! Embodying both China's culturally rich past as well as it modern present, this puzzle brings you essence of Chinese tradition and spirit. A riot of color and activity, this unique and distinctive puzzle is a feast for the eye. 

Set against the backdrop of the Hong Kong cityscape, it seems that everyone is actively engaged, and having a lot of fun! Embodying both China's culturally rich past as well as it modern present, this puzzle brings you essence of Chinese tradition and spirit.
en.name: Hong Kong
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Hong Kong - 500

en.description: Brandish your swords and take up your shields because the great battle is on! Set in the mountainous lands of Germany, this wonderful fantasy painting features dragons of all shapes and temperaments. Brandish your swords and take up your shields because the great battle is on! Set in the mountainous lands of Germany, this wonderful fantasy painting features dragons of all shapes and temperaments.
en.name: Imaginary Dragons
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Imaginary Dragons - 100

en.description:
If there is an example of finding success by redefining yourself it has to be the Dodgers. Established in 1883 as the Brooklyn Atlantics, by 1932 they had also been known as the Bridegrooms, the Grooms, the Superbas, the Robins, and the Trolley Dodgers before settling on the Dodgers. That was the Brooklyn Dodgers, there was one more change to come. In 1958 they moved clear across the nation to become the Los Angeles Dodgers. Dodger Stadium did not welcome the team until 1962 and it is currently the 3rd oldest stadium in MLB. The team has won 6 world championships, 5 since moving to LA. 

Located just outside of the downtown area, Dodger Stadium is often referred to, by locals, as Chavez Ravine. The Dodgers are so apart of our culture that the words dodger blue conjures a very specific shade of blue. Got my dodger dog, let’s play ball.
en.name: LA Dodgers
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Los Angeles Dodgers - 500

en.description: Las Vegas is a mirage in the desert for the millions of people who visit it each year. Leave it to Eric to find a way to turn this showy city into folk art! All of the iconic landmarks and hotels from this visual wonderland are represented in this fun and whimsical painting. Look to the horizon and you'll even see the 'Flying Elvis'!
en.name: Las Vegas
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Las Vegas - 1000

en.description: New York is the most populous city in the United States. This conglomerate of cultures is the financial, theatrical and fashion capitol of the states. With Central Park in the foreground and ships sailing in the background, this city-scape is full of architectural landmarks.
en.name: New York City
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - New York City - 1000

en.description: Located between Ontario and New York, Niagara Falls is an iconic tourist destination. With a vertical drop of over 165 feet, the falls have the highest flow rate of any waterfall in the world. In this painting, Eric captures tourists enjoying the view from a variety of locations—a bridge, boats, lookouts, and even a tightrope!
en.name: Niagara Falls
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Niagara Falls - 1000

en.description:
Welcome to the House that Ruth Built. Though replaced by a new stadium, nothing can ever replace the history, moments, and memories made in the home of the Bronx Bombers. 

Many of the greatest players and teams of all time call this home (27 championships.) This painting commemorates the game after 9-11 when the NYPD unfolded the US flag during the opening ceremonies, note the stars in the background pay tribute to the Twin Towers. 

Spend an evening inside white picket fence of Old Yankee Stadium in the home of legends.
en.name: New York Yankees
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - New York Yankees - 500

en.description: The Eiffel Tower takes center stage in this charming view of The City of Lights. This amazing piece of architecture was completed in 1889 for the Paris Exposition and was controversial at the time. However, nowadays Parisians consider the Eiffel Tower a proud symbol of their glorious city.
en.name: Paris
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Paris - 500

en.description: The fun and excitement of the rodeo is alive and well in this fun scene from small-town America, where cowboys, clowns, kids and rodeo queens line the ring to cheer for the riders. Each person in the stands is unique, with a story all their own. Do your own "people watching" with a colorful re-print of this fun artwork or enjoy it in a puzzle!
en.name: Rodeo Days
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Rodeo Days - 100

en.description: The historical Hotel del Coronado takes center stage in this painting of scenic San Diego. Known as the most popular wedding destination in the United States, this beautiful resort has been attracting tourists since 1888. It is easy to see why San Diego is nicknamed "America's finest city".
en.name: San Diego, CA
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - San Diego, CA - 500

en.description: Known as the only consolidated city-county in California, San Francisco encompasses a land area of only 46 square miles. With his folk art style, Eric has somehow managed to fit it all into this painting! From Fisherman's Wharf, Coit Tower, China Town, the Transamerica Building, among other famous San Francisco landmarks, this painting has a myriad of landmarks and fun scenes to discover.
en.name: San Francisco
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - San Francisco - 500

en.description: Nicknamed the "Emerald City", Seattle is truly a sight to behold. Combining both futuristic and historical architecture, this amazing city fascinates its visitors. Take a ride on the monorail, explore Pike's Place Market, or enjoy the view from the Space Needle. Whatever you choose to do in this beautiful city, you are sure to have a wonderful time.
en.name: Seattle
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Seattle, WA - 1000

en.description:
These Giants stepped clear across a continent. No, they really did. Originally the New York Giants, in 1958 the franchise moved clear across the country to become the San Francisco Giants. The Giants have 7 World Series Championships (2 since 1958.) Following the trend of new stadiums, in 2000 the San Francisco Giants moved to AT&T Park and their old digs could not hold a “Candlestick” to it. 

Built in the downtown area on the bay, homeruns go into McCovey’s Cove where an armada of personal watercraft pursue the souvenirs. The stadium was designed so that fans without tickets can watch the game from large arched portals in right field. The Giants are strong title contenders and you can take the field with them with this piece.
en.name: San Francisco Giants
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - San Francisco Giants - 500

en.description: Take a turn back in time in this historical rendition of the Statue of Liberty from years ago. Watch tourists and native New Yorkers alike stroll through Battery Park in the foreground. Sailing ships of all shapes and sizes travel through the New York harbor and the majestic Statue of Liberty stands elegantly in the center of the painting, framed by a backdrop of famous "Dowdle clouds."
en.name: Statue of Liberty
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Statue of Liberty - 500

en.description:
"G’day mate!” Welcome to Sydney Australia. Originally a prison colony for England, the settlers scratched a harsh existence from the shores of what would become known as Port Jackson. The hard scrabble existence forged a hearty people who fiercely love their land. In Eric's first Australian painting, the Sydney Harbour Bridge, known to locals as “the coat hanger,” stands proudly above historic Luna Park with the globally identifiable Sydney Opera House sitting in stately elegance against the Sydney skyline. 

Featuring activities popular with tourists and boats out on the harbor, Eric’s painting brings out some of Australia’s most populous city’s popular areas and parks. Spend some time down under in Sydney, where hearts are warm and the drinks are cold.
en.name: Sydney, Australia
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Sydney, Australia - 500

en.description: Get your friends together and prepare for the night of your life as you experience frostbite in the most exuberant way possible—that's right, on New Year's Eve in Times Square! The crowds of celebratory people, streets lined with neon lights, and entertainers galore pack the night and this painting. Originally midnight was marked by fireworks off of the Times building, but the ball-drop has long-been the traditional way to ring in the new year.
en.name: Times Square
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Times Square - 500

en.description: This companion piece to Eric's renowned "Noah's Ark" painting, captures the view under the oceans during the great flood. The fishes and sea life are busy, happily enjoying life in a flooded world while the ark floats past overhead. This charming image is great fun for children and families alike.
en.name: Under the Sea
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Under the Sea - 50

en.description: Ah, blue Hawaii! Slow things down and take in the enchanted coasts of this pacific island state on the shores of Waikiki. High rise hotels line the beach and the setting sun glows behind iconic Diamond Head. Waikiki beach hosts many events a year, including surf competitions, outdoor performances, hula dancing and outrigger canoe races. Let your cares drift away as you dive into this vacationers dream.
en.name: Waikiki, Hawaii
en.title: Dowdle Folk Art - Waikiki, Hawaii - 500

en.description:
Playful Pup Conditioning Shampoo is specially formulated for puppies. With deep cleansing action, it's ideal to wash away dirt and muck on a puppy's fur, while being super-sensitive to suit more fragile skin.  

It helps keep the natural oil balance of the skin and coat, using a delicately fragranced blend of calming lavender and rose essential oils. It is also infused with the beautiful fresh scents of lemongrass and orange which naturally repel fleas and insects, combined with gentle cleansing agents. This pH-balanced formula contains wheat protein, oatmeal, argan oil and aloe vera leaf juice. This helps a puppy's skin feel nourished, with a conditioned and soft coat. When it comes to grooming, puppies will enjoy a stress-free, easy brush.

This product is free from harsh chemicals such as alcohol, parabens, soap and dyes. It is safe to use with topical flea products too. HOWND is against animal cruelty. Playful Pup Conditioning Shampoo is Leaping Bunny certified by Cruelty Free International.
en.name: Playful Pup Conditioning Shampoo
en.title: HOWND - Playful Pup Conditioning Shampoo

images.alt: Image of Playful Pup Conditioning Shampoo

en.description:
Playful Pup Body Mist can be sprayed onto a puppy's dry fur after bathing and between washes. Doing so keeps their coat gleaming, refreshed and smelling gorgeous! Just spritz, then brush or rub the mist into your puppy's fur to release the playful scent of rose, lemongrass and orange essential oils.  

This pH-balanced formula contains wheat protein, oatmeal, argan oil and aloe vera leaf juice, which together keeps a puppy's skin and coat nourished. After application, puppies will be left with a beautifully scented coat and a glossy sheen.

This product is free from harsh chemicals such as alcohol, parabens, soap and dyes. It is safe to use on a daily basis. HOWND is against animal cruelty. Playful Pup Body Mist is Leaping Bunny certified by Cruelty Free International.

Using a combination of orange, coriander and petitgrain essential oils, this product's formula provides a gentle and deep cleanse. It also relieves dry flaky skin and helps reduce shedding and scratching, common in senior dogs. This pH-balanced formula contains wheat protein, oatmeal, argan oil and aloe vera leaf juice, which together keeps a dog's skin and coat nourished.

Golden Oldies is free from harsh chemicals such as alcohol, parabens, soap and dyes. It is safe to use with topical flea products too. HOWND is against animal cruelty. Golden Oldies Conditioning Shampoo is Leaping Bunny certified by Cruelty Free International.

en.description:
HOWND Yup You Stink! Conditioning Shampoo contains a natural grime busting formula for dogs that get extra smelly! Through a combination of eucalyptus and cedarwood essential oils, and gentle odour neutralisers, this conditioning shampoo helps deodorise dogs and absorb strong odours from fox poo, dirt and grime. Ideal for stinky dogs who roll in stinky stuff, and will wash off urine, grease and tear stains too!

The antibacterial properties of this product provide a deep, yet gentle, clean to a dog's skin and coat. Its PH-balanced formula contains wheat protein, oat kernel, argan oil and aloe vera leaf juice. This nourishes, conditions and softens the skin and coat, leaving a wonderful glossy sheen.

Yup You Stink! is free from harsh chemicals such as alcohol, parabens, soap and dyes. It is safe to use on a daily basis. HOWND is against animal cruelty. Yup You Stink! Conditioning Shampoo is Leaping Bunny certified by Cruelty Free International.

en.description: Does your dog like to roll in stinky stuff? Ever not wanted to put your pooch back into the car after a monster roll in the park? We've created a travel-size pack of emergency antibacterial dog wipes to take wherever you and stinky poochie go! The pack contains 5 jumbo size (30x20cm) pH-balanced wipes that are alcohol and paraben free, made with essential oils, aloe vera leaf juice and odour control ingredients that are gentle on your dog's skin and coat, yet effective for wiping off fox poo, cow dung, mud, urine, slobber and all things smelly while you're out and about. They won't tear in your hands, and are Cruelty Free International certified. You may still need to wash down your dog later in the day with our YUP YOU STINK! Conditioning shampoo – it just depends in what revolting substance your dog has rubbed itself!
en.name: Yup You Stink! Emergency Dog Wipes!

en.description:
The Complete GastrobiPlex Weight Management System

  • GastobiPlex Meal Replacement Adjunct Shake – 30 Servings
  • GastrobiPlex Weight Loss Capsules – 60 Capsules
  • Exercise & Recipe Booklet For Improved Success

The primary mechanism utilized in GastobiPlex® Capsules supports “Healthy Weight Management” through enhancement of leptin function.  Leptin is a hormone produced by fat cells that regulates body weight. Normally, in healthy weight individuals, leptin crosses the blood-brain barrier to influence brain activity in the areas of satiety and appetite suppression. Leptin also boosts glycemic control and metabolism. In overweight and obese people, leptin production is high, yet its function is diminished because the body becomes resistant to it. Leptin resistance results in increased appetite, poor blood sugar balance, and slower metabolism. GastrobiPlex® Capsules are clinically proven to lower leptin resistance and improve leptin function. This is a primary factor in GastrobiPlex’s ability to promote weight-loss and fat reduction.

GastrobiPlex® Shake is an all natural dietary supplement that makes weight management easier by helping you feel full sooner and longer. That feeling of “satiety” makes it easier to stick to your diet’s meal plan by minimizing feelings of hunger during and after meals. You will simply eat less!

The active component in GastrobiPlex® Shake is a natural protein called Proteinase Inhibitor II (PI2). [P12] works by enhancing the body’s release of cholecystokinin (CCK), a natural compound created during digestion that signals the brain that food has been eaten, which helps to create feelings of fullness and satisfaction.

GastrobiPlex® Shake has been specially formulated to have an incredibly delicious taste, while being low in calories. GastrobiPlex® Shake will not stimulate metabolism or cause jitters, bloating, or other side effects commonly associated with other weight management products.

en.description:
Barrel-Aged Straight Bourbon Whiskey

"PUT SOME SIDEBURNS ON YOUR FACE!”

Color:  Caramel

Nose:  Solid cinnamon and vanilla opening with light corn, wood spice and brown sugar.

Flavor:  Enters unflinchingly at 96 proof and undergoes a metamorphosis on the palate from burnt sugar, to cedar, to cinnamon/clove and ends with toffee bar and milk caramel.

How: Burnside Bourbon has a grain bill of 79% corn and 21% rye and malted barley that is mashed and distilled then pumped into brand new American oak barrels.

Once the aged spirit is reviewed and approved by our Master Distiller it is then customarily formulated by vatting similar barrels within the rack house.  Finding the right balance of heat and sweet is a true art form that is regarded highly in the spirits industry.

Every barrel has a unique profile, ranging from smoky and dense to vanilla and light.  Numerous samples must be collected and meticulously blended in order to find its way into an award winning Burnside Bourbon bottle.

BOTTLE SIZE: 750ML

96 PROOF/48% ALC/VOL

Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009. Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009.
en.name: Burnside Bourbon
en.title: Eastside Distilling - Burnside Bourbon

en.description:
Burnside Oregon Oaked Bourbon

Barrel-Aged Straight Bourbon Whiskey

“PUT SOME SIDEBURNS ON YOUR FACE!”

Color:  Sunny, copper

Nose:  Oak, cedar and piney coals.  Once the whiskey is aired dessert tannins such as fruit cake, apricot, caramel and vanilla.

Flavor:  Bursts forth with white oak and the unmistakable heat of a heavily charred barrel.  Served on the rocks the whiskey undergoes a metamorphosis from dense smoke to wispy vanilla and baked bread.

How: Here we took the southern stand-by and brought it home to the Northwest.  Oregon’s diverse climate grows a rare, drought resistant oak that was primarily used as fire wood as it was hard to season without warping the planks.

However, some clever vintners knew the potential of the mighty oak that no one wanted.  Motivated by the rising cost of importing French varietals and the importance of making the craft more sustainable they set off on a grand experiment that changed the cask landscape forever.

As luck would have it the resulting wines were brilliant.  Today there is a two year wait for new barrels and we’re proud owners of a small handful available.  These are used as agents for a second aging of our Burnside Bourbon which we will rest up to 4 months.

The resulting whiskey is layered with high octane flavors from the first barrel and a smattering of savory spice from the second.  We will use these barrels numerous times until the flavor profiles become too weak, approximately 3 years.

BOTTLE SIZE: 750ML
96 PROOF/48% ALC/VOL

Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009. Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009.
en.name: Burnside Oregon Oaked Bourbon
en.title: Eastside Distilling - Burnside Oregon Oaked Bourbon

images.alt: Image of Burnside Oregon Oaked Bourbon

en.description:
HANDMADE WITH REAL OREGON MARIONBERRIES

MADE WITH NATURAL FLAVORS

Color:  Plum wine

Nose:  Bright, potent aroma of sweet mango, blackberry and raspberry

Flavor:  Opens with intense fresh berries then quickly sweeps to citrus and ultimately evolves into warm brandy and stone fruit essences.  The finish lingers awhile with subtle young whiskey heat and baked tart dryness.

How: Flavored whiskeys are the hottest spirits on the national market right now.  You can’t escape the 30 variations of sweet cinnamon and honey finding their way to your local bar shelves.  What these spirits are lacking is creativity and sincerity.

What we’ve done is find a harmonious balance between sweet, heat and definitely neat.  Marionberries, a hybrid of two native blackberries, grows wild and abundantly in Oregon.The berry has little acidity that when infused accompanies the semi-sweetness of its base.  Again, there are no artificial flavors, preservatives or extracts in Oregon Marionberry Whiskey.  It stands alone as a true-to-form, locally derived contribution to this exciting new market.

BOTTLE SIZE: 750ML / 60 PROOF/30% ALC/VOL

Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009. Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009.
en.name: Oregon Marionberry Whiskey
en.title: Eastside Distilling - Oregon Marionberry Whiskey

en.description:
WHISKEY WITH REAL OREGON CHERRIES

WHISKEY WITH A BLAST OF REAL CHERRIES!

Color:  Crimson, merlot, cranberry

Nose:  Bing cherry, raspberry, sweet chutney and light citrus

Flavor:  Like warm cherry pie the fruit is the star of the show, then the baked dough.  The liquid ‘pie’ joyfully plays with the hints of oak and spice that taste good enough to eat.

How: It is like a flavor bomb going off in your mouth!  We source our cherries directly from Oregon Cherry Growers who grow on over 80,000 acres across the state. We support local agriculture one bottle at a time.  Using direct maceration techniques, we are able to maintain the rich colors and flavors of the fruit.  Cherry Bomb Whiskey may not grow on trees but it is definitely close.

BOTTLE SIZE: 750ML / 60 PROOF/30% ALC/VOL

Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009. Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009.

en.description:
FOUR TIMES DISTILLED  •  DISTILLED FROM POTATOE

YOU SAY POTATO, WE SAY VODKA!

Color:  Clear

Nose:  Ethanol, earthy minerals

Flavor:  Silky through and through; opens with refreshing mineral water and gentle ethyl notes.  Absolutely no burning sensation with a sweep of cotton candy sweetness. 

How: This spirit was hand-picked for its exceptional quality and it’s trueness to the craft.  Portland Potato Vodka embodies the history and nature of the modern world’s first popular spirit.

Distilled five times, and cut with Bull Run mountain water, the distillate is left in its truest form and shines alone without any gimmicks.  Potatoes are nature’s oldest starches and were most abundant when the science of distillation became an integral part of a thriving community. Let this vodka speak for itself on your taste buds and be instantly whisked back to the land and time of pure, unadulterated, exceptional spirits.  It is also gluten free.

BOTTLE SIZE: 750ML / 80 PROOF/40% ALC/VOL

Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009. Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009.

en.title: Eastside Distilling - Portland Potato Vodka

en.description:
DOUBLE-DISTILLED PREMIUM SILVER RUM

IT’S MUCH MORE FUN BELOW DECK!

Color:  Clear

Nose:  Molasses, tropical fruit, caramelized bananas

Flavor:  Velvety, medium body rum with a sweep of peppery anise and octane minerals.  Like the Puerto Rican styles widely seen in the market today, Below Deck Silver Rum has a light cane flavor that is not overly sweet and not overly alcoholic.

How: This rum is a perfect addition to the Eastside lineup.  We were very picky about sourcing the perfect spirit to call Below Deck and carry our line of flavored rums.

The rum is artfully prepared and filtered then proofed to an approachable 40% for maximum depth of flavor.  We’re positive this will become a mainstay on your liquor shelf for any occasion; be it a spontaneous summer barbeque punch or a cup of cocoa needing that little something extra.  Enjoy!

Cocktail Suggestion:  With the natural citrus and peppery characters of this rum you can be the mixologist!  Make it a perfect tropical juices or a savory concoction of herbal or spiced teas.

BOTTLE SIZE: 750ML / 80 PROOF/40% ALC/VOL

Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009. Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009.
en.name: Below Deck Silver Rum
en.title: Eastside Distilling - Below Deck Silver Rum

images.alt: Image of Below Deck Silver Rum

en.description:
DOUBLE-DISTILLED PREMIUM RUM WITH NATURAL FLAVORS

IT’S MUCH MORE FUN BELOW DECK!

Color:  Golden amber

Nose:  Brown sugar, baked snicker doodle, nutmeg, vanilla and subtle cinnamon.

Flavor:  Mulling spices, toffee, velvety vanilla notes and fizzy cola finish.

How: Traditionally spices were added to rum to defeat the heat of the fresh distillate, along with just about anything; fruit, insects and even fish!  We weren’t keen on totally defeating the rum but rather enhancing it.

Below Deck Spiced Rum embodies a little of the tradition and a lot of imagination.  Flavored with whole herbs and spices and never artificial additives, you’ll taste the familiar notes of cinnamon, clove and citrus peel and the not-so-familiar such as mace and galangal root. Collectively the spices create a second-to-none drinking experience and a one-of-a-kind addition to the long, storied spiced rum lineage.

BOTTLE SIZE: 750ML / 80 PROOF/40% ALC/VOL

Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009. Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009.

en.title: Eastside Distilling - Below Deck Spiced Rum

images.alt: Image of Below Deck Spiced Rum

en.description:
DOUBLE-DISTILLED PREMIUM RUM WITH NATURAL FLAVORS

IT’S MUCH MORE FUN BELOW DECK!

Color:  Honey, pours like chardonnay

Nose:  Candied ginger, bark, citrus

Flavor:  Zesty raw ginger with an effervescent citrus tang.  Positive medicinal characteristics that are invigorating and soothing.  Below Deck Ginger Rum is made with no artificial flavors or sweeteners and is crafted with the most flavorful ginger available.

It was critical during development to solely use natural ingredients allowing this healthful root to shine bright on the palate.

How: Below Deck Ginger Rum is a straight maceration process of infusing our Below Deck Silver Rum with the highest quality, pure ginger extract.

Unlike the wide array of processed and artificially flavored food and beverages we see lining the shelves of our supermarkets, the name says it all: “Ginger Rum”.  Simple.  Smart.  Always Natural.

BOTTLE SIZE: 750ML / 70 PROOF/35% ALC/VOL

Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009. Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009.
en.name: Below Deck Ginger Rum
en.title: Eastside Distilling - Below Deck Ginger Rum

images.alt: Image of Below Deck Ginger Rum

en.description:
DOUBLE-DISTILLED RUM WITH COFFEE

IT’S MUCH MORE FUN BELOW DECK!

Color:  Black licorice, coffee bean

Nose:  Espresso, cherry fruit, nut chocolate and faint apple undertones.

Flavor:  Pugnacious opening of alcohol immediately leading to creamy, semi-sweet chocolate and low acidity coffee beans.  The rum lingers on the sides of the palate with shy vanilla notes and essences of demarara sugar.

How: We were tempted to keep this quaint creation all to ourselves as it was made with the intention of getting through these long, dark, northwest mornings at the distillery.

But alas, the secret was out that we were imbibing on something that most would need to keep a secret!  Jacked up java!  Relying on the strong backbone of Below Deck Silver Rum we set out to capitalize on the bounty of coffee roasters/producers in our fair city. And after careful consideration of our options the crew agreed upon an origin, a roaster, and a bean.  What transpired was a cockamamie method of cold brewing and pressing out a juice good enough to blend in rum and keep the sandman at bay for a bit longer.

*Disclaimer: please drink responsibly and not at your workplace.  We have special permissions.  Cheers!

BOTTLE SIZE: 750ML / 70 PROOF/35% ALC/VOL

Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009. Eastside Distilling has been producing handcrafted spirits in Portland’s Distillery Row since founding in 2009.

en.description:
Barrel-Aged Straight Whiskey

Barrel Hitch is an American Whiskey bottled at 80 proof – The brainchild of two professional women with a passion for spirits, Master Distiller Mel Heim and Chief Branding Officer Carrie Earles, Barrel Hitch American Whiskey embodies the idea that all whiskey is not created equal. Whiskey is a complex, layered spirit that does not need embellishing for the sake of inclusion.

What is more tempting than brown sugar and vanilla? Buttery oak and a silky body? Barrel Hitch was created with one goal in mind: Let’s make a whiskey for everyone. Bottled at 80 proof, Barrel Hitch American Whiskey hits the mark with a smooth body and notes of toasted oak, green apple and vanilla.

This remarkable profile is the result of a meticulous blending process of numerous finished whiskey sources. This step is a crucial part of exacting the whiskey as every barrel contributes a unique scent, flavor, mouth feel and color that ultimately must be balanced for consistency and quality. This approachable spirit is a shining example of how science and art, when properly executed, form a harmonious union that redefines the standard.

en.description:
ZING Vodka is made in America (Rochester, New York) from a blend of corn and wheat. It is quadruple-distilled in a state-of-the-art column still, after which it is subjected to rigorous filtration to ensure essential purity. The vodka is then bottled at 80 proof (40% alcohol by volume).

If you're tired of austere vodkas without character or personality, ZING Vodka is a refreshing change of pace. ZING Vodka has a discernible set of aromatics. It is a super-premium vodka unparalleled in smoothness.

ZING Red Velvet is exactly what it sounds like - a delicious liquid version of this classic confection. The crystal clear vodka has a lightweight body and a cherry and vanilla nose with light cocoa notes. It immediately bathes the palate with the flavor of red velvet cake plus a welcome 70-proof zing on the finish. ZING Red Velvet embodies the ultimate indulgent drinking experience, combining super premium vodka with the rich taste of red velvet.

The unique bottle design boasts sophisticated LED technology that illuminates the bottle with just one touch. The LED light in the bottle reinforces ZING Vodka's underlying message of excitement and opulence, turning ordinary moments into extraordinary ones. In addition to the LED light embedded at the base of the bottle, ZING's high energy brand is reinforced through its unique hexagonal shaped bottle, which features high end chrome accents.

This stand-out design captures attention at restaurants and bars, and adds a wow factor to private events and celebrations.

ZING Vodka is available in a 750mL for both the regular ZING Super Premium Vodka and ZING Red Velvet.

en.title: Zing - Red Velvet Premium Vodka

en.description:
MAVEN IS AN UNEXPECTED NEW SUPER PREMIUM WINE-INFUSED VODKA COCKTAIL

PASSION, INNOVATION AND GREAT TASTE 

Born out of our love of fine wine and the lack of quality choices at most bars, clubs and lounges, we set out to raise the bar.

Maven Cocktails mingles super premium gluten-free vodka, wine and all natural flavors to create a consistent one-of-a-kind cocktail with the flavor of a great glass of wine and the spirit of a classic mixed drink. Inspired by the vibrant energy of New York City, Maven is the ultimate combination of style and great taste. Maven Cocktails are currently available in Maven Chardonnay and Maven Pinot Noir.

OUR COMMITMENT TO QUALITY 

We use the best all-natural ingredients. The result is a truly high quality, ready to drink cocktail. 

By combining gluten-free vodka, which is distilled 6 times, with super premium wines from the Edna Valley and Russian River, we have perfected the proprietary blend that is used to create our cocktails.

INSPIRED DESIGN 

Maven Cocktails’ signature, single-serve frosted glass bottle features our striking logo, inspired by the very place where Maven was created: New York City. 

The logo pays homage to the city’s irrepressible energy, unexpected connections, architectural beauty and sophisticated spirit. 

As the most exciting new drink to hit the market, the bottle is an instant conversation starter and turns heads in any room.

MAVEN IS PERFECTLY BALANCED FOR A SMOOTH, REFRESHING TASTE AND READY TO DRINK

en.description:
Aroma of currants and dried cherries. Matches grilled meats, hearty stews, and a variety of cheeses. 

Tasting Notes
A full-bodied Cab offering flavors of dark blackberries, cassis and underbrush with a sweet vanilla note on the medium-length finish. As the wine opens spice and anise notes become very evident. Great Value Cab!

The Winery
At Block 478 the wines express the individual character of each vineyard site, resulting in consistent wines from each vintage. 

Every block of grapes we harvest is 10 acres or less; because of this we are able to focus their attention on every vine.

Their minimalist approach to winemaking and hands-on attention to detail, results in consistently high quality wines year after year. Every step of the winemaking process is done carefully. The grapes are sorted 3 times before fermentation, on the vine, going into the picking bins, and on a sorting table before fermentation. The result is the purest expression of the fruit in the wine.

en.description:
Excellent citrus and tropical flavors. Matches poultry, seafood and an array of fine cheeses. 

Tasting Notes

"The Santa Barbara County Chardonnay was picked early to get the acidity and excellent citrus and honey flavors. 

We wanted to keep as much of the fruit flavors as possible so the wine has only received a little bit of malolactic fermentation and no oak. The wine has such a rich mouth feel we didn't think it was necessary to try and add anything to distract from the natural acid fruit and round quality of the wine."

en.description:
Complex flavors bursting of black cherries, raspberry, sweet vanilla, and brownspices. Rich and concentrated with silky tannins and excellent structure. 

Tasting Notes
Spicy notes of pepper, raspberry and red cherry pop from the glass. Intense flavors of boysenberry, sweet tobacco and vanilla hit the palate. A nice zin at a great price.

Food Pairings
Pairs well with BBQ foods and grilled meats.

Winemaker Notes
Take the two vineyards that provided the grapes for the 2011 Block 478 Zinfandel. The wine is a blend of 90% Zin and 10% Petite Sirah, and two distinct Sonoma County microclimates were tapped by the Block 478 winemaker.

The Zinfandel came from a hilltop block of the Stefani Vineyard in Dry Creek Valley, known as one of the quality capitals of Zin in California. 

The Petite Sirah grapes were grown on the Passalaqua Ranch, sited on the benchlands of the Alexander Valley, not far from the famous Jim Town Store.

Hand punching every six hours during the fermentation process — a technique normally reserved for Pinot Noir — helped produce a wine with silky tannins. That makes it ready to drink now, which means you won’t have to wait to savor its sweet fruit and vanilla flavors, framed by engaging spice notes.

The Winery
At Block 478 the wines express the individual character of each vineyard site, resulting in consistent wines from each vintage. Every block of grapes we harvest is 10 acres or less; because of this we are able to focus their attention on every vine. Their minimalist approach to winemaking and hands-on attention to detail, results in consistently high quality wines year after year. Every step of the winemaking process is done carefully. The grapes are sorted 3 times before fermentation, on the vine, going into the picking bins, and on a sorting table before fermentation. The result is the purest expression of the fruit in the wine.

en.description:
Excellent color and deep rich flavors of cherry and pomegranate layered with spice. Matches grilled salmon, smoked meats, cheese and dark fruits. 

Tasting Notes
Finding the right microclimate for growing Pinot Noir grapes can be challenging. Fortunately, California is blessed with a handful of areas that accommodate the needs of this most persnickety varietal. These range from Santa Barbara County in the southern sector of the state, up to the Carneros district that straddles Napa and Sonoma counties, over to Sonoma’s Russian River Valley area, and up to coastal Mendocino County. 

And then there’s the Sonoma Coast AVA (American Viticultural Area), which consists of approximately 2,000 vineyard acres, extending from San Pablo Bay in the south to the Mendocino County border in the north. The AVA is defined by its cool climate, which provides an ideal setting for growing perfectly ripened Pinot Noir grapes. 

This is where Block 478 sources the grapes for its Pinot Noir bottling — a medium-bodied wine with both sweet and savory notes, plenty of fruit-forward flavor, and a degree of finesse that proclaims, “Special occasion!”

The Winery
At Block 478 the wines express the individual character of each vineyard site, resulting in consistent wines from each vintage. Every block of grapes we harvest is 10 acres or less; because of this we are able to focus their attention on every vine. Their minimalist approach to winemaking and hands-on attention to detail, results in consistently high quality wines year after year. Every step of the winemaking process is done carefully. The grapes are sorted 3 times before fermentation, on the vine, going into the picking bins, and on a sorting table before fermentation. The result is the purest expression of the fruit in the wine.

en.description:
Russian River is known for producing complex, delicate Pinot Noir. With warm days and cool nights, the grapes develop balanced acids and flavors, resulting in rich wines with bright colors and flavors. We farm our Russian River vineyards with these climate conditions in mind, and manage the vine’s canopy to allow ripening while maintaining the essence of the growing region. This Pinot Noir comes from two of our vineyards, Green Valley and Oak Meadow. Both in cool, low yielding sites.

In 2013, our Russian River Pinot Noir was sourced from the finest vineyards throughout the appellation. These vineyards are located near the coast, growing in a very cool and moist climate. An extended growing season allowed our Pinot Noir to develop excellent color and deep, rich flavors. The wine exhibits cherry and pomegranate layered with spice in the nose and mouth.

Aged in 100% New French Oak for 10 months. 

Alcohol Percentage on the Label: 13.5%

en.title: Clone 5 - Pinot Noir - Santa Barbra County - (2013)

images.alt: Image of 2013 - Pinot Noir - Santa Barbra County

en.description:
The legendary Alexander Valley is notorious for producing some of the most complex Cabernet Sauvignon in the New World. With hot days and cool nights, the grapes develop balanced acids and thick skins, resulting in rich tannins and superior color. 

We farm our Alexander Valley vineyards with these climate conditions in mind. By managing the canopies correctly, we encourage smaller berries, resulting in a high skin to juice ratio. With these little berries we can take advantage of the excellent fruit flavors and color.

Our exceptional vineyards within the appellation, Peterson Vineyard and Soda Rock, combine to make this 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon complex and compelling. Rolling hills of rocky, loam soils, force the vines to struggle for water, producing grapes that are packed with rich chocolate and tobacco flavors, with layers of dark cherry.

Aged in French and American Oak for 15 Months.  

Alcohol Percentage on the Label: 13.5%
en.name: 2013 - Cabernet Sauvignon - Alexander Valley
en.title: Clone 5 - Cabernet Sauvignon - Alexander Valley - (2013)

images.alt: Image of 2013 - Cabernet Sauvignon - Alexander Valley

en.description:
In 2014 we took our California Sauvignon Blanc from a 30-year-old old Lodi vineyard we call Vino Verde. This older vineyard’s fruit had concentrated flavors to which we added a splash of Reisling to enhance the aromas and adding complexity. 

A complete stainless steel fermentation and a total lack of secondary fermentation kept our California Sauvignon Blanc’s acidity crisp and lively. Aromas of flowering jasmine, granny smith apple and a touch of lemon zest abound. Vino Verde Vineyard produced Suvignon Blanc in 2013 with flavors of kaffir lime leaves, lemon grass and sweet gooseberry.

Fermented in Stainless Steel

Alcohol Percentage on the Label: 13.5%

en.description:
Our Russian River Valley Chardonnay typifies the soft, fruity, bright and crisp flavors that made the Russian River Valley famous for Chardonnay. The 2014 Chardonnay comes from three select vineyards in 2 distinctly different micro climates ranging from very cool in the Green Valley area to warmer days in the Russian River plain area.

The gravelly soil associated with the Russian River provides minerality and structure to grapes. The resulting wine is a fantastic example of Chardonnay showcasing the effects of micro climates in the Russian River Valley.

Our Chardonnay has 30% malolactic fermentation that helps round out the edges while maintaining the crisp Russian River influence. Aromas of apples and citrus combined with a hint of French oak make this wine enjoyable by itself or with food.

Aged in French Oak for 3 months. 

Alcohol Percentage on the Label: 13.7%

en.description:
In Monterey County, Arroyo Loma Vineyard’s Merlot grapes are some of the last fruit picked. In 2012 Arroyo Loma was the obvious choice for our Monterey County Merlot. With an exceptionally long hang time, accompanied by an excellent combination of hot days and cool nights the Merlot grapes maintained acidity, kept their rich aromas, and expressed a deep almost black-purple color. The clonal selection for this vineyard site is one that produces ripe flavors at relatively low brix resulting in lower alcohol levels and incredible balance.  

Our Merlot is fermented at low temperature to maintain its flavors and structure. This Merlot’s subtle French oak component compliments the fruit resulting in a complexity that exhibits varietal correctness. Black cherry and blueberry intermingle elegantly with hints of spice and vanilla providing a beautiful, balanced wine.

Alcohol – 13.5%
